VolumeConfig.description: VolumeConfig contains properties used to setup a volume for any system.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

VolumeConfig.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a volume config for a Redfish implementation.

DiskCachePolicy.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of Disk Cache Policy of volume config.(Default: Unchanged)
DiskCachePolicy.description: The Disk Cache Policy of the volume config.

Raid.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of RaidLevel of volume config.
Raid.description: The raid level of the volume config.

LdWritePolicy.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of LD Write Policy of volume config.(Default: Write Back)
LdWritePolicy.description: The LD Write Policy of the volume config.

LdReadPolicy.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of LD Read Policy of volume config.(Default: No Read Ahead)
LdReadPolicy.description: The LD Read Policy of the volume config.

LogicalDriveCount.description: The new logical drive count of the volume config.
LogicalDriveCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of new logical drive count of volume config.(Max LDs: 16)

ControllerId.description: The controller id of the volume config.
ControllerId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of controller id of volume config.

StripSizePerDDF.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of Strip size per DDF of volume config.(Default: 256K)
StripSizePerDDF.description: The Strip size per DDF of the volume config.

AccessPolicy.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of Access Policy of volume config.(Default: Read Write)
AccessPolicy.description: The Access Policy of the volume config.

LdIOPolicy.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of LD IO Policy of volume config.(Default: Direct IO)
LdIOPolicy.description: The LD IO Policy of the volume config.

UsePercentage.description: The percentage of the disk to be used.
UsePercentage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of disk percentage use.

VdName.description: The VD name of the volume config.
VdName.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of RaidLevel of volume config.(alphabet or number(Max Chars: 15; Keep blank for none)):

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

InitState.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of Init State of volume config.(Default: No Init)
InitState.description: The Init State of the volume config.

Span.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of physical disk per span of volume config.

PhysicalDrives.description: The disk index collection of the volume config.
PhysicalDrives.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of disk index collection of volume config.

title: #VolumeConfig.v1_0_0.VolumeConfig
